name: 胡服騎射 Hufu riding and shooting
name_original: 胡服騎射 Hufu riding and shooting
description:
Build market to trade.
Buy perfect dress to riding and shooting.
Great behavior.("Hufu riding and shooting")

建立市场去交易。
购买适合的衣服去骑马与射箭。

伟大的行为。("胡服騎射")

MainMap Control
Left Mouse click ----goto MainMap Position
Right Mouse click ---view MainMap Position
Mouse Scroll ----Camera near Player or Camera far Player
“z”“x”---Rotate around view Player

FightMap Control
"w" "s" "a" "d" "Mouse move"----Control Player Move
(Like ThirdPersonController)

"1" "2"----change weapon（1=“Sword”;2=“Bow”;）

When use sword attack,
"Left Mouse click"-----Can Attack Enemy.

When use bow attack,
You can
"Left Mouse Press"-----Bow Attack Hold.
"Left Mouse Up"----Shoot Attack.

大地图键盘鼠标操作：
鼠标左键点击大地图任意位置----Player将移动到鼠标点击的位置
鼠标右键点击大地图任意位置----屏幕将跟随鼠标的移动位置（即鼠标移动去哪里，屏幕大地图也去哪里）
鼠标中间滚轮滑动----摄像机-远离-或者-靠近-大地图
“z”“x”---旋转视角

战场地图键盘鼠标操作：
"w" "s" "a" "d" "Mouse move"-----控制玩家移动

"1" "2"----切换武器

当使用长剑时，
“鼠标左键点击”----使用当前武器进行攻击

当使用弓箭时，
“鼠标左键点击”----使用当前武器进行攻击
“鼠标左键按住不松手”----弓箭拉弓瞄准
“鼠标左键松手”---弓箭发射
